                    kitId: 'ktx1fxj'
                };
                (function () {
                    var tk = document.createElement('script');
                    tk.src = '//fonts.smdg.ca/' + TypekitConfig.kitId + '.js';
                    tk.type = 'text/javascript';
                    tk.async = 'true';
                    tk.onload = tk.onreadystatechange = function () {
                        var rs = this.readyState;
                        if (rs && rs != 'complete' && rs != 'loaded') return;
                        try { Typekit.load(TypekitConfig); } catch (e) { }
                    };

                    s.parentNode.insertBefore(tk, s);
                } ());

        </div>

    window.ShawFindShow.init('#9c92e10a-d6de-4cac-b695-30e4ae60bcf4');
</script>

<div class="shaw-widget press_release_wrap">

<h3 class="full bottom">Press Releases</h3>

 

    <div class="allPressReleases">
    <ul>
    
    <li class="release_group clearfix press_release_wrap">                 
        <h3>  April 02, 2015 </h3>
        <div class="release">            
            <a class="release_header" href="http://www.shawmedia.ca/Media/PressReleaseDetail.aspx?pressReleaseId=6442461639">BIG BROTHER CANADA’S SINDY WITH AN ‘S’  GETS EVICTED WITH AN ‘E’ </a>
   
            <p> In a unanimous 12-0 vote, Toronto's own Sindy Nguyen, better known as Sindy with an 'S', was the second houseguest evicted from <strong><em>Big Brother Canada</em></strong> in Wednesday night's drama-packed episode.  </p>
            
            <div class="release_footer clearfix">
                <span class="twitter-share"><a href="https://twitter.com/share" class="twitter-share-button" data-url="http://www.shawmedia.ca/Media/PressReleaseDetail.aspx?pressReleaseId=6442461639" data-text=".@BigBrotherCA &#39;s Sindy With An ‘S’ Gets Evicted With An ‘E’ " target ='_blank'>Tweet</a></span>
                <span class="fb-share">                    
                    <a class="fb-share-btn" href="//www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=http://www.shawmedia.ca/Media/PressReleaseDetail.aspx?pressReleaseId=6442461639" target="_blank">Share This</a>
                </span>
             <a href="http://www.shawmedia.ca/Media/PressReleaseDetail.aspx?pressReleaseId=6442461639" class="more right"><span class="ir"></span>Read More</a>
            </div>                              
        </div>
        <h3>  April 02, 2015 </h3>
        <div class="release">            
            <a class="release_header" href="http://www.shawmedia.ca/Media/PressReleaseDetail.aspx?pressReleaseId=6442461650">SHOWCASING SHOWCASE: CHANNEL CELEBRATES 20th ANNIVERSARY WITH DYNAMIC NEW BRANDING</a>
   
            <p> <strong>Showcase</strong>, Canada's leading destination for premium drama, celebrates its 20th anniversary on air with a national consumer marketing campaign, highlighting a dynamic, <strong>new look, logo and voice</strong>. <strong>Beginning this week</strong>, viewers will see a refreshed brand, on-air and off-air, infused with <strong>colourful creative elements</strong> that complement the channel's famed character-driven dramas and blockbuster movies.  </p>
            
            <div class="release_footer clearfix">
                <span class="twitter-share"><a href="https://twitter.com/share" class="twitter-share-button" data-url="http://www.shawmedia.ca/Media/PressReleaseDetail.aspx?pressReleaseId=6442461650" data-text="Showcasing @showcasedotca: Channel celebrates 20th anniversary with dynamic new branding" target ='_blank'>Tweet</a></span>
                <span class="fb-share">                    
                    <a class="fb-share-btn" href="//www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=http://www.shawmedia.ca/Media/PressReleaseDetail.aspx?pressReleaseId=6442461650" target="_blank">Share This</a>
                </span>
             <a href="http://www.shawmedia.ca/Media/PressReleaseDetail.aspx?pressReleaseId=6442461650" class="more right"><span class="ir"></span>Read More</a>
            </div>                              
        </div>
        <h3>  March 30, 2015 </h3>
        <div class="release">            
            <a class="release_header" href="http://www.shawmedia.ca/Media/PressReleaseDetail.aspx?pressReleaseId=6442461623">EMERGENCY GOES BEHIND THE SCENES IN THE ER – THE PATIENTS, THEIR LOVED ONES &amp; THE HEALTH CARE…</a>
   
            <p> A visit to the emergency department can be an emotional experience for 
the patient and for the loved ones that accompany them. The new 
documentary series <strong><em>Emergency</em></strong>gives viewers an intimate look at the lives of patients in some of Canada’s busiest emergency departments.  </p>
            
            <div class="release_footer clearfix">
                <span class="twitter-share"><a href="https://twitter.com/share" class="twitter-share-button" data-url="http://www.shawmedia.ca/Media/PressReleaseDetail.aspx?pressReleaseId=6442461623" data-text="EMERGENCY GOES BEHIND THE SCENES IN THE ER – THE PATIENTS, THEIR LOVED ONES &amp; THE HEALTH CARE PROFESSIONALS…" target ='_blank'>Tweet</a></span>
                <span class="fb-share">                    
                    <a class="fb-share-btn" href="//www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=http://www.shawmedia.ca/Media/PressReleaseDetail.aspx?pressReleaseId=6442461623" target="_blank">Share This</a>
                </span>
             <a href="http://www.shawmedia.ca/Media/PressReleaseDetail.aspx?pressReleaseId=6442461623" class="more right"><span class="ir"></span>Read More</a>
            </div>                              
        </div>
        <h3>  March 26, 2015 </h3>
        <div class="release">            
            <a class="release_header" href="http://www.shawmedia.ca/Media/PressReleaseDetail.aspx?pressReleaseId=6442461404">HISTORY&#174; GREENLIGHTS FOURTH SEASON OF HIT SERIES VIKINGS</a>
   
            <p> <strong>HISTORY</strong>® announced today that it has picked up a       
 fourth season of its hit scripted series <em><strong><a title="Vikings" href="http://www.history.ca/vikings/" target ='_blank'>Vikings</a></strong></em>, 
 created and written by Michael Hirst (<em>The Tudors, Elizabeth</em>).  Five    
 new  episodes remain in the current season airing Thursdays at 10pm ET/PT with  
  the   season finale slated for Thursday, April 23rd at 10pm ET/PT.  </p>
            
            <div class="release_footer clearfix">
                <span class="twitter-share"><a href="https://twitter.com/share" class="twitter-share-button" data-url="http://www.shawmedia.ca/Media/PressReleaseDetail.aspx?pressReleaseId=6442461404" data-text="HISTORY&#174; GREENLIGHTS FOURTH SEASON OF HIT SERIES VIKINGS" target ='_blank'>Tweet</a></span>
                <span class="fb-share">                    
                    <a class="fb-share-btn" href="//www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=http://www.shawmedia.ca/Media/PressReleaseDetail.aspx?pressReleaseId=6442461404" target="_blank">Share This</a>
                </span>
             <a href="http://www.shawmedia.ca/Media/PressReleaseDetail.aspx?pressReleaseId=6442461404" class="more right"><span class="ir"></span>Read More</a>
            </div>                              
        </div>
        <h3>  March 26, 2015 </h3>
        <div class="release">            
            <a class="release_header" href="http://www.shawmedia.ca/Media/PressReleaseDetail.aspx?pressReleaseId=6442461586">RISHA DENNER BECOMES FIRST EVICTED HOUSEGUEST ON BIG BROTHER CANADA</a>
   
            <p> In a <strong><em>Big Brother Canada</em></strong> first, the fate of the season's first evictee was put in the hands of viewers, who voted to evict 41 year-old Torontonian, Risha Denner. Upon eviction, Risha's spirits were lifted when Arisa Cox revealed that her time in the house might not be over yet, and later told the audience that the first five houseguests evicted will compete for a second chance to enter the house.   </p>
            
            <div class="release_footer clearfix">
                <span class="twitter-share"><a href="https://twitter.com/share" class="twitter-share-button" data-url="http://www.shawmedia.ca/Media/PressReleaseDetail.aspx?pressReleaseId=6442461586" data-text="Risha Denner Becomes First Evicted Houseguest On @BigBrotherCA " target ='_blank'>Tweet</a></span>
                <span class="fb-share">                    
                    <a class="fb-share-btn" href="//www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=http://www.shawmedia.ca/Media/PressReleaseDetail.aspx?pressReleaseId=6442461586" target="_blank">Share This</a>
                </span>
             <a href="http://www.shawmedia.ca/Media/PressReleaseDetail.aspx?pressReleaseId=6442461586" class="more right"><span class="ir"></span>Read More</a>
            </div>                              
        </div>
    </li>


    </ul>
    </div>
